name: lotus-extension
description: Lotus - API Replay Tool for Chrome

scripts.build: mkdir -p dist && zip -r dist/lotus.zip background.js devtools.html devtools.js lib/ LICENSE manifest.json panel.css panel.html panel.js popup.html README.md
scripts.build:win: if not exist dist mkdir dist && powershell Compress-Archive -Force -Path background.js,devtools.html,devtools.js,lib,LICENSE,manifest.json,panel.css,panel.html,panel.js,popup.html,README.md -DestinationPath dist/lotus.zip
scripts.version: node -e "const fs = require('fs'); const manifest = require('./manifest.json'); const pkg = require('./package.json'); manifest.version = pkg.version; fs.writeFileSync('./manifest.json', JSON.stringify(manifest, null, 2) + '\n');"
